name: DERBY-UN-IN-UN
description:
Created for the Fantastic Arcade Duplicade jam
http://itch.io/jam/duplicade

A homage to the "31 in 1" multicart for the NES

Player one
WASD to run/jump
space to shoot

Player two:
arrow keys to run/jump
enter to shoot

Grab menu items from the screen by running/jumping into them.

Shoot the menu item you're holding into the other player.

Points awarded for hitting your opponent is equal to the number of the menu item.

Round ends in 30 seconds.

"That was fucking awesome" - Wiley Wiggins



Note: Not compatible with Windows 8
New: 1.1 version corrects swapped controls.

Point system idea by "Executive Producer" Matthew Keeping.
Platform coding adapted from the platformer tutorial by Shaun Spalding.
https://www.youtube.com/user/999Greyfox
Sound effects created with SFXR.
Cartridge being inserted into NES sound clip by Adam Hartling.
Music editing through Audacity.
Background effect created with shdSterio3D Gamemaker asset by alexandervrs.
Created in GameMaker Studio.
